Detailed Description

template<class T>
struct TweenFirst< T >

This helper struct is used by SynchronisedAnnal to provide the default function used to interpolate between two event structures.

When t is 0, the current time is exactly at input a, and when t is 1 it's at input b.

See also:
AnnalSynchronised

TweenNumeric
